在大脑中的记忆和感觉处理中心之间发现的直接连接脑电路的新确定的一部分混合了感官信息，记忆和情绪，以说明事物是熟悉还是新事物，并且重要的是“背景噪音”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250219/direct-connection-found-bet-memory-and-memory-and-sensory-sensory-centers-centers-centers-in-brain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250219/direct-connection-found-bet-memory-and-memory-and-sensory-sensory-centers-centers-centers-in-brain-brain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=546c8f44444444-2ec5-474e-b6b7-a7b59fd5a977 Wed, 19 Feb 2025 00:57:17 -0500 Direct connection found between memory and sensory processing centers in brain
娱乐活动，而不是工作活动，与较低的2型糖尿病风险有关研究人员发现，无论职业体育锻炼如何，在休闲时间进行中等至剧烈的体育锻炼都与2型糖尿病的风险降低有关。久坐的休闲活动和苛刻的职业活动的结合可能会增加风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250219/recreational-eccise-not-work-work-activity-to-lower-to-lower-type-2-diabetes-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250219/recreational-eccise-not-work-work-activity-to-lower-to-lower-type-2-diape-2-diabetes-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2f1C1E19-BBCD-4739-9DF4-FA1286E3BD09 Wed, 19 Feb 2025 00:45:55 -0500 Recreational exercise, not work activity, linked to lower type 2 diabetes risk
